urls.title: Police move in after Herefordshire river bulldozed and straightened
urls.description: Witness describes damage to mile-long stretch of Lugg as egregious act of ‚Äòecological vandalism‚Äô

text:
Ye Gods, wtfh is wrong with people. As soon as @EnvAgency was alerted it could/should have immediately stepped in to halt the destruction of this river & it's environs which is protected as an SSSI. We don't have another planet in reserve! 
https://t.co/v75CkrYWmU
